nodes.text: The Altyr 5 Light Freighter Race was a starship race for light freighters. It was named after Altyr 5. Despite the  name, the race took place in space. Starting sometime between 10 BBY and 9 BBY, Imperial-endorsed racers began to win, until sometime between 5 BBY and 4 BBY, when the Spectres won. Imperial Patrol hated when racers who were not Imperial-endorsed were in the lead, and would to anything in their power to stop them from from winning.
